primary.developer_bio:
I have been exploring web development for almost 4 years. Since 2021, I’ve been deeply focused on WordPress. Developing custom plugins and themes, and successfully publishing some of them in the official WordPress Plugin and Theme Directory.


Recently, I’ve expanded my expertise to Prismic, where I’ve already built several projects. Working with Prismic has strengthened my skills in headless CMS development, content modeling, and modern frontend integration giving me the flexibility to build faster, scalable, and content-driven applications.

content.text: I’m a WordPress Developer with a strong focus on building custom themes and plugins that are fast, scalable, and tailored to client needs. With experience across PHP, JavaScript, Next, React, WordPress and Prismic, I create solutions that blend functionality with clean, maintainable code.
I’m passionate about solving problems through code, continuously learning, and crafting websites that not only look great but also perform seamlessly.

data.meta_description: I'm a WordPress developer focused on creating custom themes and plugins that are fast, scalable, and tailored to my clients' needs. With experience in PHP, JavaScript, React, and WordPress, I create solutions that combine functionality with clean, maintainable code.
